STBLKeyStringList.Text: {0.SimFirstName} has learned everything there is to know about {1.SimFirstName}:\n\n{2.String}
{1.SimFirstName} is already an open book to {0.SimFirstName}.

Now that {0.SimName} is a Teen, {M0.his}{F0.her} Vampire Powers have fully manifested. {M0.He}{F0.She} no longer has a Hunger, Energy, or Bladder motive and must consume Plasma to satisfy {M0.his}{F0.her} thirst.

I'm stuffed! Couldn't drink another bite! I won't turn {M1.him}{F1.her}, but {1.SimFirstName}'s so delicious it would take a LOT of garlic to keep me away next time! I'll be back when I crave another midnight snack.
I'm not a history buff. Maybe check out the library for a book to see if it helps?
If you search around online you can find out where to purchase volumes of the Encyclopedia Vampirica.
I really don't know anything more about vampires. Try searching on the computer.
Sorry, I've never looked into it. Try out a search on the computer or in the library.
I keep my copies of the Encyclopedia Vampirica in mint condition. You will have to go online to order your own.
VonFlavius sells copies of the Encyclopedia Vampirica. If you search on a computer you can find the shop. Research long enough and you may find a copy of the Ultimate Vampire Compendium.
Why did the Vampire need medicine?\n\nFor his coffin!
Fang you very much for laughing at my puns!
Why are vampires always so tired? \n\nThey're always dead on their feet!
What happens to a vampire that loses a fight?\n\nThey're down for the Count!
Why do you see so many vampires at restaurants?\n\nBecause they love to go out for a bite!
What do you call a master vampire?\n\nA real pain in the neck!
What is a vampire's favorite drink?\n\nDra-cola!
What kind of books do vampires like to read?\n\nSomething they can really sink their teeth into!
Have you ever read the vampire newspaper? It has great circulation!
How do vampires keep busy?\n\nBy looking for their necks victim!
Why are vampires bad at self-improvement?\n\nBecause they can't reflect on their mistakes!
How do vampires flirt?\n\nBy batting their eyes!
Did you see the end of the vampire video game tournament? They were neck and neck!
(From Throwing a Cure at a Vampire)
(From Being Forced to Take the Cure)
(From Drinking Plasma From A Tasty Sim)
Now that was some sweet, sweet plasma! I'll definitely be coming back for more!
This plasma really pleases my palate!
Being a plasma connoisseur, I have a special appreciation for that extraordinary drink that satisfies every craving. Thank you.
Hey! What do you think you are doing?
How rude! One should ask for permission before ravaging another's neck.
Haven't you heard of plasma fruit??
{0.SimFirstName} read that Garlic and Plasma fruit can be found in Forgotten Hollow!
{0.SimFirstName} read that sunlight is very bad for Vampires. Potentially deadly in fact!
{0.SimFirstName} read that Vampires prefer to sleep in coffins. As an added bonus, it protects them from the sun!
{0.SimFirstName} read that it is possible for Vampires to be cured! {M0.He}{F0.She} may be able to learn more by continuing {M0.his}{F0.her} research.
{0.SimFirstName} read that vampires can be out during the day as long as they have a ceiling over their head which stops the most powerful of the sun's rays.
{0.SimFirstName} read that really powerful Vampires sometimes pass down their experience to Sims they turn.
Coffins keep out all sunlight when closed. {0.SimFirstName} can do something useful with that bit of info.
This section says some vampires are guilty about having to feed on Sims and do everything they can to avoid it.
{0.SimFirstName} read that talented Vampires can turn other Sims into Vampires. A mortal Sim can even ask a Vampire to Turn them (provided they know the Vampire well enough).
{0.SimFirstName} read that frogs are a valuable source of materials for creating your own plasma packs.
{0.SimFirstName} read that low level vampires can be trained by higher level ones.
{0.SimFirstName} read that some Vampires have been observed turning into bats!
This passage says that enough garlic spread around a house can prevent a Vampire from biting Sims.
{0.SimFirstName} read that there is a special drink concoction which can allow vampires to walk in the daylight for a limited time.
{0.SimFirstName} read that Vampires have the ability to cast and dispel various mind powers.
The Ultimate Vampire was mortal once...but he was turned immortal through a curse!
It says here that making fun of a Vampire's accent is the easiest way to be uninvited to their next party.
It says here that most Vampires cannot enter a home without being invited. {0.SimFirstName} may want to rethink that welcome mat.

This chapter goes into detail about Vampires who walk in the sun. The sunlight reversal cocktail will give temporary immunity to the sun. Vampires who train in Sun Resistance can survive even longer in the sun.
{0.SimFirstName} read that Count Vladislaus Straud the First was the sole survivor of the original settlers who discovered Forgotten Hollow.
{0.SimFirstName} has learned everything {M0.he}{F0.she} can about Vampires from this book.

{0.SimFirstName} has exhausted all information on Vampires that {M0.he}{F0.she} can find online. If {M0.he}{F0.she} wants to learn more, {M0.he}{F0.she} should order some Vampire Books on the computer.
{0.SimFirstName} has finally become the {M0.Patriarch}{F0.Matriarch} {M0.he}{F0.she} always wanted to be. {0.SimFirstName} has successfully established a powerful clan of vampires!
This Sim wants to create a family of Vampires!
It takes power, cunning, and determination to become a true master vampire. {0.SimFirstName} is now in the upper echelons of the powerful vampires in the world.
This Sim wants to become a wise and powerful Vampire!
Not all super predators are evil. {0.SimFirstName} has proven this to be true. They have held on to their humanity and proved to everyone what a Good Vampire can be.
This Sim wants to control {M0.his}{F0.her} Thirst and remain as human as possible!

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Deplete the Needs of another Sim!</font>\n\nManipulating common Sims is key to weakening prey. Deprive Needs allows one to deplete the Hunger, Energy, Bladder, or Hygiene of a chosen target. Make them uncomfortable, then strike!

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Make nearby Sims find {0.SimFirstName} attractive.</font>

{0.SimFirstName}'s Vampiric Charms makes {M0.him}{F0.her} all the more effective at the game of love.

<font color = '#c40000'>Conflicts with Undead Aura</font>

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Make nearby Sims find you attractive.</font>

Your ability to attract and seduce other Sims has grown beyond mere Charm to full on Allure.

<font color = '#c40000'>Conflicts with Undead Aura</font>

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Make nearby Sims find you attractive.</font>

With but a single glance your seductive charisma can lure a fascinated mortal to your side… 

<font color = '#c40000'>Conflicts with Undead Aura</font>

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Control the minds of other Sims.</font>\n\nWhen life's pesky errands must be run, spare {0.SimFirstName}'s cuticles and soft, ancient hands, and have {M0.him}{F0.her} command others to perform Cleaning, Repairing, and other joyful household tasks instead.

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Learn all about another Sim's traits.</font>\n\nDo away with tedious conversations and getting to know others. {0.SimFirstName} will learn other Sims' personalities instantly by visiting their frontal lobe {M0.himself}{F0.herself}.
<font color = '#1e81e6'>Make nearby Sims feel a specific emotion.</font>\n\n{0.SimFirstName} can subtly direct the emotions of others, nudging them this way or that way as {M0.he}{F0.she} sees fit.
<font color = '#1e81e6'>Make nearby Sims feel a specific emotion.</font>\n\nYour influence over mortal emotions has grown, allowing you to alter all manner of situations to meet your needs.
<font color = '#1e81e6'>Make nearby Sims feel a specific emotion.</font>\n\nYou have achieved mastery of mortal emotions- they are playthings for you to control as you wish!

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Make another Sim talk to themselves!</font>\n\nEveryone needs a friend, yes? What if the friend is one of {0.SimFirstName}'s devising, and what if it doesn't really exist? No one will be able to tell!

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Put another Sim to sleep.</font>\n\nWhat if {0.SimFirstName} could command others to sleep at will? {M0.His}{F0.Her} will, that is! Irresistible Slumber will drop them to the floor with nothing but Zzzzs and snoring to show for it.

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Put another Sim into a trance.</font>\n\nWhen a prey is moving too quickly, or just won't stop talking, or {0.SimFirstName} simply wants to force a Sim into a catatonic state, {M0.he}{F0.she} simply needs Mesmerize.

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Become more resistant to changes in emotion.</font>

{0.SimFirstName}'s emotions are cool and calm. Not for {M0.him}{F0.her} are the petty peeves and lusts of the flesh that so many other Vampires suffer from.

<font color = '#c40000'>Conflicts with Eternal Sadness</font>

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Become more resistant to changes in emotion.</font>

{0.SimFirstName}'s unruly emotions are tightly controlled by {M0.his}{F0.her} iron will. Rages are almost completely a thing of the past.

<font color = '#c40000'>Conflicts with Eternal Sadness</font>

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Become more resistant to changes in emotion.</font>

{0.SimFirstName} has moved beyond mortal emotion to a world of total logic and calm precision. Love, Anger, Disgust - these are things of {M0.his}{F0.her} distant past.

<font color = '#c40000'>Conflicts with Eternal Sadness</font>

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Fun Need doesn't decrease anymore.</font>\n\nAs {0.SimFirstName} evolves away from the life of the living and becomes a true creature of the night, {M0.he}{F0.she} can part with the trappings of {M0.his}{F0.her} human form. By diminishing {M0.his}{F0.her} need to have Fun, {M0.he}{F0.she} can focus on other pursuits.

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Hygiene Need doesn't decrease anymore.</font>\n\nAs {0.SimFirstName} evolves away from the life of the living and becomes a true creature of the night, {M0.he}{F0.she} can part with the trappings of {M0.his}{F0.her} human form. By completely discarding {M0.his}{F0.her} need to satisfy {M0.his}{F0.her} Hygiene, {M0.he}{F0.she} can focus on other pursuits.

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Social Need doesn't decrease anymore.</font>\n\nAs {0.SimFirstName} evolves away from the life of the living and becomes a true creature of the night, {M0.he}{F0.she} can part with the trappings of {M0.his}{F0.her} human form. By diminishing {M0.his}{F0.her} need to Socialize, {M0.he}{F0.she} can focus on other pursuits.

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Become stronger in the night time!</font>\n\nThe night time is the right time for the nocturnal undead. As a Child of the Moon, {0.SimFirstName} will be able to wield more powers, will learn skills faster, will tire less quickly, and will be happier. Embrace the moon and soak in its benefits!

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Become stronger in the night time!</font>\n\nThe night time is the right time for the nocturnal undead. As a Creature of the Night, {0.SimFirstName} will be able to wield more powers, will learn skills faster, will tire less quickly, and will be happier. Embrace the moon and soak in its benefits!

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Become stronger in the night time!</font>\n\nThe night time is the right time for the nocturnal undead. As a Master of Darkness, {0.SimFirstName} will be able to wield more powers, will learn skills faster, will tire less quickly, and will be happier. Embrace the moon and soak in its benefits!

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Use less Vampire Energy!</font>\n\n{0.SimFirstName} is beginning to study {M0.his}{F0.her} Vampiric Energy and the many ways it can be used. {M0.He}{F0.She} can expend less energy for the same effect. Further study will reduce Vampire Energy costs even more…

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Use less Vampire Energy!</font>\n\nThrough study and practice {0.SimFirstName} has reduced the amount of Vampiric Energy needed to fuel {M0.his}{F0.her} powers. Continued study will yield even greater efficiency…

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Use less Vampire Energy!</font>\n\nA Master manipulator of occult power, {0.SimFirstName} has finessed {M0.his}{F0.her} Vampiric Energy use to the ultimate in efficiency. The cost of using all powers is significantly reduced.

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Gain resistance to the harmful effects of sunlight.</font>

The sun's rays are a disastrous downside of the vampiric path. With Sun Resistance, {0.SimFirstName} can better withstand its rays.

<font color = '#c40000'>Conflicts with Thin Skinned</font>

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Gain resistance to the harmful effects of sunlight.</font>

The sun's rays are a disastrous downside of the vampiric path. With Greater Sun Resistance {0.SimFirstName} is more impervious to the sun's cursed effects, but {M0.he}{F0.she} must still be wary and cautious during the daytime hours.

<font color = '#c40000'>Conflicts with Thin Skinned</font>

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Become completely immune to the sun.</font>

The sun's rays are a disastrous downside of the vampiric path. No longer! With Perfect Sun Resistance, {0.SimFirstName} can completely ignore the sun's destructive rays. They will wash over {M0.his}{F0.her} skin harmlessly as {M0.he}{F0.she} becomes a day walker.

<font color = '#c40000'>Conflicts with Thin Skinned</font>

<font color = '#1e81e6'>{0.SimFirstName} will never drink from other Sims on {M0.his}{F0.her} own when low on Thirst.</font>

The threat of entering into a frenzy at extreme stages of thirst should give every vampire pause. Tamed Thirst calms the vampire, meaning {0.SimFirstName} will never go into a frenzy or drink from Sims in an uncontrolled manner. Tamed Thirst is for the refined and genteel vampire.

<font color = '#c40000'>Conflicts with Insatiable Thirst</font>

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Increases rate of Power gain during sleep and lets {0.SimFirstName} sleep more soundly.</font>

What's the point of being undead if {0.SimFirstName} has to sleep like the living? Vampiric Slumber will provide a deeper, more relaxing sleep that replenishes {M0.his}{F0.her} energy more quickly.

<font color = '#c40000'>Conflicts with Fitful Sleep</font>

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Increases rate of Power gain during sleep and lets {0.SimFirstName} sleep more soundly.</font>

{0.SimFirstName} sleeps very soundly in {M0.his}{F0.her} coffin. Dreams, nightmares, noises... these human trivialities seldom bother {M0.him}{F0.her}.

<font color = '#c40000'>Conflicts with Fitful Sleep</font>

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Increases rate of Power gain during sleep and lets {0.SimFirstName} sleep more soundly.</font>

{0.SimFirstName} no longer sleeps like mortal beings. Instead {M0.he}{F0.she} enters a trance-like state where {M0.his}{F0.her} body freezes in corpse-like immobility as {M0.his}{F0.her} mind summons Eldritch Power to fuel {M0.his}{F0.her} undead form.

<font color = '#c40000'>Conflicts with Fitful Sleep</font>
<font color = '#1e81e6'>Win fights more often and work out more efficiently.</font>\n\nVampiric Strength grants {0.SimFirstName} an edge when it comes to fitness, sparring or fighting.
<font color = '#1e81e6'>Increases Strength.</font>\n\n{0.SimFirstName}'s unnatural Strength grows, granting {M0.him}{F0.her} a powerful advantage in all matters of fitness, fighting and sparring.

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Unlocks the ability to crush Metals and Crystals into elements.</font>\n\nYour preternatural Strength has reached its peak. Not only are you vastly superior in combat, you can crush raw elements into refined mineral samples with your bare hands.

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Gain immunity to the negative effects of Garlic objects.</font>\n\nGarlic is a vile and wretched weed that unfortunately has a negative impact on the vampiric kind. Well, no longer, assuming {0.SimFirstName} adapts with Garlic Immunity.

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Gain the power to lock & unlock doors at other Sims' homes.</font>\n\nHaving to ask permission to enter the home is so pedestrian. Not only may {0.SimFirstName} enter a home without invitation, with just a small burst of Vampire Energy {M0.he}{F0.she} can lock and unlock doors as {M0.he}{F0.she} sees fit. Will {M0.he}{F0.she} wreak lock havoc? Of course!

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Gain the ability to fly anywhere as a bat.</font>\n\nNobody ever suspects the bat, and no one certainly won't suspect {0.SimFirstName} flying about as such. Move from hither to yon, and even find love, as a sonar wielding creature of the night.

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Gain the power to Drain Life Spirit from other Sims, or Restore Life Spirit from those who have been drained.</font>\n\nUnlocks true power over life itself! Drains life Spirit from other Sims, making them highly susceptible to adverse vampiric powers. Enables {0.SimFirstName} to protect the ones {M0.he}{F0.she} loves -- or simply refresh {M0.his}{F0.her} prey -- using Restore Life Spirit.

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Gain the power to teleport anywhere as a cloud of mist.</font>\n\nIn a world of vampiric and unseen forces, alternative methods of travel are needed to accomplish one's nefarious tasks. Mist Form allows for instantaneous and cloudy travel.

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Gain the power to turn other Sims into Vampires.</font>\n\n{0.SimFirstName}'s desire may be to increase the pool of vampiric kind, either to ensure {M0.he}{F0.she} has eternal friends for {M0.his}{F0.her} eternal life, or to outpace the Sim population. With Vampire Creation, {0.SimFirstName} can turn Sims into Vampires, allowing them to live, as the undead, for the first time.

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Gain the power to run at super speed.</font>\n\nWalking is pedestrian in every way. The time it takes to walk from here to there could be better spent manipulating prey. Supernatural Speed will elevate {0.SimFirstName}'s pace greatly, blurring {M0.him}{F0.her} from Sim eyes in the process.

<font color = '#1e81e6'>{0.SimFirstName} is weaker during the day, and {M0.his}{F0.her} powers fail far more often.</font>\n\nEven when {M0.he}{F0.she} is not in direct Sunlight, {M0.he}{F0.she} still knows the Sun is there… just waiting for {M0.him}{F0.her} to step outside during the day. {0.SimFirstName}'s Powers are less effective during the day, and harder to use due to gnawing anxiety.

<font color = '#1e81e6'>{0.SimFirstName} is weaker during the day, and {M0.his}{F0.her} powers fail far more often.</font>\n\nThe daytime fills {M0.him}{F0.her} with dread. The hateful firey orb of the Sun is like a malevolent eye, watching {M0.his}{F0.her} every move! {0.SimFirstName} can barely concentrate on using {M0.his}{F0.her} Powers, and {M0.his}{F0.her} vampire energy seems to leak away all the time.

<font color = '#1e81e6'>{0.SimFirstName} is weaker during the day, and {M0.his}{F0.her} powers fail far more often.</font>\n\n{0.SimFirstName}'s only {M0.himself}{F0.herself} during sweet, blessed night. It's the only time {M0.he}{F0.she} is safe from the HATED DAYSTAR and it's baleful, vampire energy draining influence.

<font color = '#1e81e6'>{0.SimFirstName} will occasionally get really, really sad.</font>

The strains of life without end depress {0.SimFirstName} from time to time. Sadness will emerge when it is least expected.

<font color = '#c40000'>Conflicts with Dampened Emotions</font>

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Power gain is reduced while sleeping.</font>

Conflicted by a lifetime without end, {0.SimFirstName} sleeps less soundly and recovers {M0.his}{F0.her} vampire energy more slowly.

<font color = '#c40000'>Conflicts with Vampiric Slumber</font>

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Power gain is reduced while sleeping.</font>

Haunted by nightmares that terrorize even the immortal undead, {0.SimFirstName}'s once-restful sleep is further interrupted and {M0.his}{F0.her} power recovers even more slowly.

<font color = '#c40000'>Conflicts with Vampiric Slumber</font>

<font color = '#1e81e6'>{0.SimFirstName} gains less Thirst when drinking.</font>\n\nUnfortunately, {0.SimFirstName} has a drinking problem. {M0.He}{F0.She} drinks from {M0.his}{F0.her} prey sloppily, which leads to excess, and well, it just takes much longer to satisfy Thirst.

<font color = '#1e81e6'>{0.SimFirstName} gets Thirstier more quickly.</font>

{0.SimFirstName} will need to replenish {M0.his}{F0.her} Thirst more often. {M0.He}{F0.She} best have a large pool of prey…

<font color = '#ec262e'>Conflicts with Tamed Thirst</font>

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Only able to sleep in Coffins.</font>\n\n{0.SimFirstName} has very particular needs when it comes to slumber. {M0.He}{F0.She} can only sleep and nap in coffins as no other surface is appropriate for {M0.his}{F0.her} eternal bones.

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Makes the sun more harmful than normal.</font>

{0.SimFirstName}'s bone dry skin is quick to burn in the sun's rays. {M0.He}{F0.She} must be careful when outdoors during daytime hours.

<font color = '#c40000'>Conflicts with Sun Resistance</font>

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Makes the sun more harmful than normal.</font>

Your undead flesh is significantly weakened against UV rays. Avoid sunlight as much as possible. 

<font color = '#c40000'>Conflicts with Sun Resistance</font>

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Makes the sun more harmful than normal.</font>

Your night suffused plasma boils at the slightest touch of the sun. A few moments exposure could end your existence. 

<font color = '#c40000'>Conflicts with Sun Resistance</font>

<font color = '#1e81e6'>{0.SimFirstName} will occasionally disgust others by hissing uncontrollably.</font>\n\n{0.SimFirstName}'s social life may take an unexpected dip from time to time due to {M0.his}{F0.her} uncontrollable hissing. It's socially odd, and contains a large degree of saliva. Get control of it!

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Relationships with other Sims start off negative.</font>

{0.SimFirstName} has drifted so far from humanity that {M0.he}{F0.she} no longer relates to the living. Non-vampires are less comfortable around {M0.him}{F0.her} and it will take longer to build friendships.

<font color = '#c40000'>Conflicts with Vampiric Charm</font>

<font color = '#1e81e6'>Become guilty when drinking from Sims without permission.</font>\n\nToo much empathy for the prey means {0.SimFirstName} will become stressed when drinking from unwilling prey.

<font color = '#1e81e6'>{0.SimFirstName} vomits when eating human food.</font>\n\nPutting on the appearance of a normal Sim will be less practical, as {0.SimFirstName} will become nausous and vomit from eating normal food. What's more important? The ruse, or {M0.his}{F0.her} digestion?
Itching to read some new information on vampires.
This book is beyond comprehension. Vampire things are too complicated!
Eeeeck! Get out get out get out get out get out! *Whew* Sleeping inside of a sealed coffin is definitely not for the faint of heart.
Even a big, bad Vampire can sometimes get scared and have a bad dream. A coffin is no protection from the inner turmoil within the mind's eye. It's written in the manual.
*Deep yawn* Well, there's nothing like a dead sleep inside an eternally quiet coffin. {0.SimFirstName} feels reinvigorated for the day (or night) ahead.
Ugh... what is this? Maybe {0.SimFirstName} is allergic to this?
Vampires hate the stench of garlic. Folks think onion breath is bad. Garlic will cross a vampire's eyes if they even get a whiff of the stuff.
{0.SimFirstName} is so miserable from the smell of garlic that {M0.he}{F0.she} will have a hard time trying to Drink Plasma.
The garlic stench is causing suffering. Ugh, no drinking Plasma until the smell is gone for sure.
That is one vegetable which doesn't agree with {0.SimFirstName}. Maybe {M0.he}{F0.she} is allergic.
It is always nice when a talented Sim takes the time to share their knowledge and skill; passing it along to others.
No one is able to resist {0.SimFirstName}'s charms. No one can turn away from {M0.his}{F0.her} sights.
Must Resist...{0.SimFirstName} must resist the urge to sink {M0.his}{F0.her} fangs in the first neck {M0.he}{F0.she} sees.
It's about time to find the next meal...
{0.SimFirstName} needs a certain liquid to quench this thirst!
The absence of emotion is the finest feeling.
Few things bother, fewer things please.
While mere mortals experience a fiery inferno of emotions, Vampires can simply say, "This is fine."
The moon's glow provides great benefits to vampiric powers.
The night's dark embrace is the perfect pick-me-up after a long, pesky sun-filled day.
Darkness of the night brings out all of the full vampire potential!
There's just something about the melancholy chimes of the Pipe Organ that causes tingles down the spine.
The beautiful notes of the Pipe Organ soothe the soul and induce a calming, almost sedative feeling.
The tune sounds familiar although distinctly foreign in nature. It's hard to pinpoint the origins of this song; the sound resonates an ageless quality.
Who needs hands to hold someone close?
Who knew bats were so romantic?
Vampires and the sun don't mix. Unlike solar cells, the sun will slowly drain a vampire's energy.
Vampire ghosts and the sun don't mix. Unlike solar cells, the sun will slowly drain a vampire's energy.
The sun resistance {0.SimFirstName} built up wasn't enough.
{0.SimFirstName} thought {M0.he}{F0.she} could make it back by sunset... {M0.he}{F0.she} thought wrong.
Everyone has the right to wear sunscreen. It just doesn't help {0.SimFirstName} at all.
The sun IS trying to kill {0.SimFirstName}.
Even though there's some protection from the Sun, it still burns!
Greater Sun Resistance really helps with the burning, but man does that still sting!
Being thin skinned really takes on new meaning for a vampire.
Staying indoors is best before someone confuses {0.SimFirstName} with an outdoor barbecue.
Thanks to the powers of the dark ley line, chances of having a Vampire Baby have been increased!
The best friends are the ones that you've brought back from the undead. A friend in need is a friend indeed, but an un-undead friend is better.
Sims can sleep more soundly knowing there is one less Vampire in the world.
The mode of consciousness achieved through dark meditations taps into the vampire's internal dark energy, converting it into much more useful vampiric energy.
Mere mortals cannot challenge the likes of {0.SimFirstName}! HA!
Seek cover immediately! Quick! Little time is left before {0.SimFirstName} makes it back to the grave!
Must seek cover immediately! No time to lose!
The damage has been done! Now must seek shelter from the sun!
The sun is quite unforgiving! Seek cover!
Seek cover immediately! The UV damage has been done. Little time is left before {0.SimFirstName} is put back in the grave.
Back to the sad world of aging up and having to take restroom breaks.
Plasma Fruit doesn't agree with {0.SimFirstName}'s physiology. It's best to pass on a second piece.
Increases mental fortitude to resist pesky vampire hypnotic tricks.
Plasma fruit cut up with surgical precision makes for an excellent Plasma Fruit Salad.
That plasma really hit the spot!
Resting these eternal bones is hard work.
The Life Spirit that was stolen has been restored, and with it, increased resilience to mental tampering!
A tasty refreshment and the ultimate UV protection.
That particular Sim was especially tasty.
What was that?! What just happened?!
The curse of vampirism has been lifted. The savings in dental bills alone are a reason to celebrate.
Good sparring session! Even immortal Vampires need to practice all the sweet moves if the plan is being the One.
The weight of eternal life can really take a toll on a vampire. Each day is no closer to an end that doesn't exist.
Feeding off the living gives {0.SimFirstName} a bad feeling, but being thirsty seems to be worse for {M0.him}{F0.her}...
How do mortals handle that accursed orb in the sky? It's so bright!
No, no, not again... bring the sweet embrace of the night!
The night is a dream. The day is a bright, bright nightmare.
Nothing fills this empty stomach anymore...
All of this food tastes awful... What is happening? This can't be good.
Appetite increasing! But not really for food...
So... thirsty... water just isn't cutting it anymore.
{0.SimFirstName} has learned everything on the internet... about vampires at least.
There's a feeling of outspoken boldness, from which source... it is unknown.
Grumble grumble. Something's really put a burr up {0.SimFirstName}'s metaphorical saddle.
Yawn. No telling why the world suddenly seems so boring, but it sure is.
Woah! Need a second to stabilize and figure out what caused this daze.
Such shame! It's inexplicable and unexplainable. And yet, the shame is there.
Body over mind! Such vigor, while unknown, is not unwelcome!
The heart flutters unexpectantly, though not unpleasantly. But why?
This is no time to dawdle, but to drill down and focus. The why can be answered last.
Bliss fills the mind, inexplicably, from some unknown source.
Such inspiration floods the brain! But why? No time to ponder, must create!
Woo! Wee! Wow! It's time to play, hooray!
There's an overwhelming desire to cry. Why the sudden rush of sadness?
Something is under the skin. Something that cannot really be described or explained. It's there, though, and tediously frustrating.
Ugh! Feeling so off, for no obvious reason, feels so wrong. Need to sit down or relax for a moment.

After holding a conversation with the new friend for several hours a mind fog slowly lifts away. The realization dawns that there was no new friend and the hours spent were mere seconds. Weeeeiiiiirrrddddd.

If beauty is in the details, then this ceiling railing is truly gorgeous. In a time long past rows of Victorian houses would have these amazing pieces decorating their entire roof lines. They don't make them like they used to.

The bones of any building must be firm, beautifully crafted, and resilient if they are to last for generations. Even, dare we say, an eternity? The Architectural Spines will rigidly stand in any structure you choose to be appreciated now, and forever, by passersby.
Columns started as merely tree trunks or stones used to bear the weight of beams and arches. But later, Columns became more refined and adorned with extravagantly carved details.
Got it. Becoming a vampire takes a few days.
Greetings, child! My ancient plasma senses you have recently been turned. It will take a few days to fully change into a vampire, but fear not! The Night awaits!

Ah! A new child of the night! As an Elder Vampire, it is my honor to welcome you to our family. Your new Thirst for Plasma takes some getting used to! Remember, Thirst can be uncomfortable, but it won't kill you. Here are some plasma packs to keep you fed for the first few days. Just stay out of the Sun and you'll be fine!
Can you not call me anymore?
So Thirst can't kill me? Phew.

You must be wondering about your new Vampire Energy. It will fuel your Powers, allowing you to do all manner of magic! Don't worry if you run out--sleeping or Dark Meditation will replenish your Vampire Energy. However, it will burn away in the sun. If you are in daylight and have none, you will burn to death--so be very careful during the day!
I got this. Don't call me again.
Daylight AND no Vampire Energy equals death. Got it.

You are progressing well! Each night you gain experience as a vampire, increasing your rank and unlocking more Powers. Researching Vampire Lore or Training with a powerful vampire are also good ways to get experience. Some increase their Rank through fighting other Vampires or Drinking Deeply from mortals, but that's not my style.
So building my Rank will unlock new Powers.
Ah! I'm so proud! You're getting the hang of vampirism. I'd be delighted to take you under my bat wing and teach you more about the Night! How about I fly over and give you some training?
I have something important that I need to ask you. Would you like to hang out for a while?
Hello there, I just wanted to welcome you to the community and...my that's a lovely neck you have there.
Sturdy. Dependable. Beautiful. The three most important qualities to any good stair railing. The Iron Railing delivers solid performance against all testing. You're on good footing with Iron Railing.

Sure, this fence is obviously neoclassical in terms of its design and style. But why does it have to be Slim? Can we stop fat shaming everything!? It's a beautiful fence regardless of its proportions.
Solid. Durable. Forever. These are the terms that come to mind when describing this particular fence. A thick and wide design gives it that foreboding touch.
This fence holds up extremely well in outdoor environments and will continue to give the clean, elegant look for years to come. It's high profile also helps it to act as a protection element.
The lines of these curves are hot enough to warm your heart. Frieze? This should be named Fiery!
Found only on the fanciest of buildings, this style of frieze is incredibly ornate and detailed. It's classic Victorian style is instantly recognizable and very much sought after.

Get behind the bar or grab a glass warmed to body temperature at The Hart Rate Taproom. This surprisingly old, yet resilient wooden piece will tell stories of the past while you gently sip a beverage that’s just your type.

Hush your little minion to sleep in this so-dark-it's-sweet crib bassinet. Extra-low sides give the baby a great world view while the bat mobile provides entertainment, so Mommy or Daddy can sleep like the dead, too!

Hush your little minion to sleep in this so-dark-it's-sweet crib bassinet. Extra-low sides give the baby a great world view while the bat mobile provides entertainment, so Mommy or Daddy can sleep like the dead, too!
Just a tiny bat... tiny, tiny bat.

The motto of this prestigious manufacturer is "When all that matters is eternal luxury." 99% of the time this vessel is used to house the 1%. In fact it's so expensive and luxurious that it is always referred to as a casket; never a coffin.
Classic and traditional, the simple wooden box has been a burial staple for centuries. The reclaimed wood finish and steel fasteners add a small, elegant touch to an otherwise frugal item.
This somber and sturdy coffin is cut from quality stone and features metalwork that is built to withstand the elements. Guaranteed to last a lifetime.

The Ancient Resting Place is carved from wood so old, everyone who witnessed the original tree must now be surely dead. With silky soft sheets that carefully repel unnecessary rays and comfort even the oldest skin, The Ancient Resting Place is where you can catch a few Zzzs, or Vvvs, as you so need.
By Vasmer Balke \n\nOrigin of the Vampire Species, Early History, Alternate Food Sources.
By Vasmer Balke \n\nKnown Weaknesses, Known Strengths, Defense Techniques, Favorite Foods.
By Vasmer Balke \n\nSunlight and the Importance of Sunscreen. Known Uses for Plasma Fruit, Garlic and Wolfsbane. Vampire Dental Care Techniques.
By Vasmer Balke \n\nFrom anatomy to Zeitgeist. Every detail collected on vampires is compiled here.
This cabinet attached to the wall or ceiling to really maximize space and allow for the most efficient layout possible. It's also a great place to hide things from short sims.

It’s good to invest in a timepiece that can withstand the test of time. Think of it as a family heirloom for you to celebrate in your lifetime, and your children to celebrate in theirs. You’ll be here a very long time – shouldn’t your preferred clock as well?
Perfect for those hard to reach ceilings that you can never clean!
This cobweb provides a very important function by connecting the wall to the ceiling. Not only does this hide unsightly lines, but offers the optimal angle to catch flies. If that's your thing.
This style web is the cornerstone of any untidy house. There is something almost magical about a perfect web spun from one corner to another.
Floor webs are the worst! You totally run into them and they get stuck all over your body. Gross.
A creature of most fascinating look and behavior. Don't be fooled by its cuteness or lack of...
Do not succumb to its cuteness, or lack thereof...

Few mortals have ever been lucky (or unlucky) enough to ever hook a Vampire Squid, much less actually catch and mount one. Let's just hope the Vampire part of the name is for effect only and it stays on the wall.

Look above yourself to eerie perches to spy The Gargoyle’s Howl. Long has it been there, and long shall it remain, despite a thousand sunrises and moonfalls. Its gaze is everlasting. Isn’t it comforting to know a piece of you will last forever?
A beautiful design; this counter features dramatic wood inlay and beautiful carved patterns throughout.
It's the details that really sell this cabinet. From beautiful columned patterns to solid metal fixture, this cabinet has a little something for everyone. What's your favorite element?

Behind every window is a story. Perhaps one of mystery, or dread, or the creak of an organ so sweet, it brings tears to one’s eyes. On the other side is the sun, the unexpected day and what it brings, and the allure is best hidden by de Rigeur.

Draw back the richly woven heavy cloth of the Century Curtains to gaze into the transparent, troubled panes adorning any home. Surely, the tribulations of time are worth blanketing with lovingly stained and woven cloth, yes? Celebrate time and its mishaps with the Century Curtains.

Draw back the richly woven heavy cloth of the Century Curtains to gaze into the transparent, troubled panes adorning any home. Surely, the tribulations of time are worth blanketing with lovingly stained and woven cloth, yes? Celebrate time and its mishaps with the Grand Century Curtains.
Holy moley! How did the hole become whole? It's going to take quite the skilled craftsman to patch this up.

Chips on the wall or surface are sadly fairly common. Paint chips; not potato chips in the wall. As delicious as that sounds how would one even embed potato chips into a wall? That makes no sense at all.

Something created a tear. In the space-time continuum? No, just on the wall. Don't get so dramatic.

Water damage leaves a telltale sign on walls. It's incredibly difficult to hide and will commonly bleed through wallpapers, paint, and other surface elements.
Gosh! Good luck hiding this crack in the wall! What even happened to cause this? Time to find something large to place in front of this crack in the attempt to hide it.

Water damage leaves a telltale sign on walls. It's incredibly difficult to hide and will commonly bleed through wallpapers, paint, and other surface elements.

A decadent style of a time long past, this double door is solidly made and contains some very beautiful details. The ornaments at the top of the door, the quality of the aged wood, the smoky glass panes - all are of unparalleled taste.

Constructed by doors so thick no sound can enter, you’ll house any creature of the day or night from behind these sturdy doors. Neither flame nor stone can breach these castle-like closed elements. Let the dead lie inside, behind the Mausoleum’s Gate.

Step through these arches, which have been here longer than, well, most of you, to truly reach your destination. The arches are finely crafted of the roughest stone, chiseled, and slimmed to perfection. The Eternal Arches will be here long after you’re gone. Well, most of you.

Be careful all ye who enter, for this door is cast in the finest wood and metal filigree to beautifully adorn any room. Its rich, soulful craftsman ship defies aging and talent. Enter with glee, exit through its frame in somber reflection.

This dresser closes as tight as a coffin to keep your clothes protected. Made from reclaimed wood from all the no longer occupied coffins in the area. Don't worry about why those coffins were empty and just enjoy the fine craftsmanship.
The highest quality plasma. Filtered, carbonated, decarbonated, chlorinated, and reverse osmosis filtered for your enjoyment.
A glass of Sunlight Reversal Cocktail
A glass of Vampire Resistance Cocktail.
This is it. The cure to immortality. A mere sip from this will immediately transform any vampire back into a normal Sim. Apply with caution.

Speculation still surrounds the reason Vladmir spent so much time crafting such an alluring fireplace. The warmth will draw you in close and keep you comfortable. The crackling fire keeps your attention focused with hypnotic dancing flames. The instinct to stay alert and watch the shadows behind you just melts away.
This flower is nothing special in its raw form. When used as an ingredient in food and drink it will affect the nocturnally oriented.
An annual bulbous plant. Its bulbs can be harvested for cooking or decorating.
Non-edible and hard to find. It is rumored these seeds are carried by the mosquitos who escape the plant's trap.
The juice in this fruit has very similar properties to plasma.
An annual bulbous plant. Its bulbs can be harvested for cooking or decorating.
This hardy shrub grows long purple wolfsbane flowers.
The Insectumlamia Simnovorii, or Sixam Mosquito Trap, is from the same genus as the Laganaphyllis Simnovorii. Its intimidating look is much less of a concern to Sims than to the wandering insect.
An eerie tree that produces plasma fruit.
A basic packet of garlic seeds.
A basic packet of Sixam Mosquito Trap seeds.
A basic packet of plasmafruit seeds.
A basic packet of wolfsbane seeds.
Cloves of garlic neatly braided into an arrangement optimal for spreading that garlic smell. Handy for pasta serving restaurants and security on plasma pack delivery trucks.
True gourmets decorate kitchens with garlic. Its a easy way to indicate who is winning in the culinary world.
Remove all question of who you want visiting your house. This wreath will make the powerful statement to those with an aversion to garlic.

Value privacy and make it happen with this gate! Solid, formidable, and permanent, it offers a grand entrance to any property. Anti-intruder alarm feature included free of charge - the gate creaks each time it opens.
One-upmanship shouldn't end at death. Make sure your grave marker is the tallest in the cemetery. Even in the afterlife you should know that you stand out from the crowd.
Imported from Simlsilvania. With a quick sanding this headstone is ready to be reused.
One-upmanship shouldn't end at death. Make sure your grave marker is the tallest in the cemetery. Even in the afterlife you should know that you stand out from the crowd.
Imported from Simsilvania. With a quick sanding this headstone is ready to be reused.
This chandelier hangs elegantly from the ceiling and is powered by candlelight. Despite it's old-world technology it outputs quite a lot of light. Beware dripping wax!
This chandelier is perfect for vaulted ceilings and large, open rooms. It's also the perfect lighting centerpiece for almost any costume party.
The best solution for a pyrophobic who really wants candle light in their house. The candles are safely locked away behind a metal cage preventing accidental burns. That is, unless it tips over.

Years and years of design revisions went into this lamp. It ships in 129 pieces and the instructions are written in 3 different dead languages. The tassels need to be removed and cleaned once a day. Just enjoy how good it looks once setup.
Sometimes the beauty of an object is defined by its imperfections. Get lost in the unique curves and lines of this holder and appreciate its rich history. Or you can just use it for light too.

After perfecting the standing floor model our designers decided to go compact. Thousands of man hours were spent researching shrinking technology. In the end the lamp pole was just replaced with a shorter version.
Add a bit of that old world charm and mood lighting to any household. Fully functional flames powered by modern day electricity.

A well carved wood frame can help simulate what you may look like as a vampire. It gives you that identifiable widow's peak without having to cut your hair. You don't want to have a widows peak? Just scrunch down a bit.

This medium sized mirror is gilded with a beautiful design and all comes together through the bat centerpice that is prominently featured on top. Adds a touch of style to any ordinary washroom or bedroom.
Grand sound from an organ that will fit in any modest hall. Enchant your guests with haunting sounds and old world flair.
While the history of this family has been lost to the ravages of time, the images are a constant reminder to days long past. The sims look so familiar though...
Moonlit roses painted by the Duchess Lucine in the 17th century. It is said she only painted by the moonlight and despised the sunlit paintings done by her peers.

Vladislaus was the town founder of Forgotten Hollow. The first settling party of 25 Sims disappeared and Vlad was the sole survivor. It impacted him so deeply he never explained what happened to them. In their memory, he did found the town on their last known location. This painting is in his memory.
These pedestals are great for elevating statues and can stand up to outdoor elements with ease.
These pedestals are great for elevating statues and can stand up to outdoor elements with ease.
These pedestals are great for elevating statues and can stand up to outdoor elements with ease.
A colorful fern that darkens any garden that gets too cheery.
This thorny ground cover will stick in your socks and generally isn't pleasant on picnics.
This rose is making it a point to show off its thorns. It probably won't win any prizes in a rose competition.
This chair silently broods. Its beauty is enclosed in darkness. Various forms of this chair can be found around the world, but this particular design focuses on classic appeal.
This distinctive ornament sits atop the apex of the roof and is commonly used to add emphasis. It is a beautiful decorative piece that stands on its own or as a grouping.
Combining the Custom Victorian Rug End pieces with the Custom Victorian Runners allows for many rug variations; including design and length modifications. Go crazy with your rug creation.
Combining the Custom Victorian Rug End pieces with the Custom Victorian Runners allows for many rug variations; including design and length modifications. Go crazy with your rug creation.
An elegant woven rug, this piece comes in many different designs and patterns. It adds a warm touch to almost any environment and is amazingly easy to keep clean.
The kneeling fairy reaches to the ground while simultaneously clutching at her chest. Historians have argued for centuries as to what this pose symbolizes.
Wings outstretched, this creature is perched in an eternal action pose; ready at a moment's notice to fly high into the sky and rain terror upon its enemies.

Every child has heard stories of the tiny winged llama who comes to terrorize the bad boys and girls of the world. Its wee beady little eyes, its sharp fangs... it's enough to make a grown Sim shudder in fear.
The true history of this woman has been lost to the ravages of time. Where did she come from? Is she smiling? Why does the cloth on her arm drape so low? So many questions!

A Victorian house wouldn't be complete without vintage radiators to circlulate heat. Our newest edition of this timeless classic features all the beauty of past models, but now offers completely silent running! No more hissing.

This antique book stand comes complete with a very old, musty edition of Victorian Homes and Gardens. But please don't touch the book or try to turn it's pages. It would crumble to dust before your very eyes.
Traditional-style cabinets with profiled doors and ornate moldings are really brought to life when adorned with decorative, old-world style handles, feet, and hinges.
In-laws knocking at the door? Quick; to the attic! Hide in the last place they'll look and peep through the windows to find out when they walk away from the front door. Whew! Privacy protected!
Crouched menacingly as if to pounce, this werewolf is a vigilant, if not terrifying, sentry. Thank goodness it's just stone.
What says rosy and cheerful more than a giant urn? Anything else? Yeah, that's probably right. But hey, at least nothing is actually inside the urn. Wait. There's nothing inside the urn, is there!?
The long extinct Cu Cu Cachoo now only resides in the glass display cases of scientists and eccentric, wealthy individuals.

One may think that this is for drying your hands after washing them. Pffft. You uncultured buffoon! Everyone knows hanging towels are for decoration ONLY! True nobility knows to wipe their hands on their pants.
First find another shrubbery. Then place it next to the tapestry, only slightly higher and to the left. Then prepare for further shrubbery instructions.
No matter how funny the joke, this face above this fountain will always remain serious. One day their expression will crack though!

Chiseled with incredible detail and craftsmanship this stone Werewolf appears as if it's going to jump right down on top of their Sim victim. A little creepy? Sure. But a lot of folks pay good simoleons for that affect.
This ivy is lush and full of life. Sure, it may have some bugs and so forth living in it, but that's the price one must pay to have a truly natural look.
The branches are brittle and dead with its small leaves barely clinging on. A sad sight to be sure. Where's the gardener?
The branches are brittle and dead with its small leaves barely clinging on. A sad sight to be sure. Where's the gardener?
The tendrils of ivy reach and grasp, hooking into any crack they find to extend their reach. Leaves form regularly, but can hardly keep up with its own rapid growth.
The branches are brittle and dead with its small leaves barely clinging on. A sad sight to be sure. Where's the gardener?
The branches are brittle and dead with its small leaves barely clinging on. A sad sight to be sure. Where's the gardener?
There's just something magical about a wall covered in ivy. Almost like there is a secret door or garden it must be hiding. One can dream, right?
Despite it's Gothic name and signature styling, one can put anything they want on this shelf. But it'd be a lot cooler if the stuff was Gothic too. It would really tie the whole shelf together.
Clawfoot tubs are all the rage. This classic design turns functional utility into gorgeous decor. You'll want everyone to see you in this beauty; hence the sheer curtain that surrounds the tub.

A free standing unit made from the combination of a beautiful porcelain basin, solid decorative base, and antique fixtures. This piece cleanly captures the elegance and class of the period. And it also cleanly captures whatever happens to fall into the sink!

Don't worry. This chair is actually quite comfy and inviting, despite the name. The only spikes are purely decorative adornments that rest on the top of the frame. To be honest, they're not even that spiky.
This chair is absolutely fantastic for reading. It's plush, deep, and offers a degree of privacy unmatched by rival chairs. A truly distinct piece.

This is a very smartly designed love seat. See how the raised backing is centered in the middle of the couch? That's no accident. That is to help the couch occupants naturally move towards the center... and towards each other. See? Super smart design!

Oh to be in love. It matters not if the stone is cold and the posterior recoils at its icy embrace, because the love of the heart warms all with its flame. But seriously, watch out for bird poop; the heart's love offers little to no protection against that.

Want to get some serious reading done, but don't have a good place to settle in? Well sink into the Thrill of the Chaise lounge and get ready to tear through some chapters in style. Never before has reading been so comfortable.
Is it a bat or is it a bear? It's both! It's Bearcula! Stuffed with cuteness, this unique toy is ready to receive your unconditional love. But he has a problem reflecting back.

What makes this piece of furniture so beautiful and sought after? Is it the sexy curve of its legs? The gorgeous wooden inlay? The perfectly adorned filigree? There is so much to love about this that it's hard to pinpoint a single reason.

In true Gothic form this table is uncomfortable, ornate, and pretentious. As it should be. This table has a massive, dignified presence and speaks of high class and wealth. In fact, serving anything less than lobster on this table should be avoided.
Despite high tank models being around for centuries, it's still far too easy to fool this toilet. All you have to do is pull its chain.
Where some Vampires lay to rest.
To hang Garlic Braids and things.
This tree suffers from neglect. Its scraggly branches are great for casting scary shadows on moonlit nights.
Lack of care has left this tree lacking in curb appeal. Legend says that once upon a time this tree was a beautiful tree, but now it seems it is not. Unless this style is something you fancy.
This tree is past its prime. Its dwindling foliage gives it an ominous look.
This evergreen pine is no longer so evergreen.
The remains of a Vampire lie here...
This small window is straightforward and boxy, but with a twist. An elegant half circle sits atop the frame, decorated with classic Victorian finishing touches.
The Victorian era was grand and splendid and the windows of the time certainly followed suite. This single wide window is beautiful and elegant.

Form and balance dominate the neoclassical style of this window and it's symmetrical purity. It's simple grace and refinement not only protects against the elements, but also against bad taste and temporary fads.
This elegant window is neoclassical in style and would be right at home next to a colonnaded façade and pedimented front porch. It presents a classical, ageless beauty.
When one narrow won't cut it just double up! Workers have taken two single glass panels and placed them in housing side-by-side. Great for allowing more light into the room.
This mansion has been slowly built up over the town's history. Plenty of space and spare coffins.
Count Vladislaus Straud IV is the latest descendant to occupy Straud Mansion. His oddly similar looking line of ancestors has resided here since the founding of Forgotten Hollow.
This Italianate Victorian manor is large enough to really stretch your wings. Its upscale decor will suit those with a taste for fine design.

The Vatore siblings moved into Forgotten Hollow a few years ago and are striving to make it their home. This can be quite challenging at times since they are not exactly on the best terms with Vladislaus Straud, but when asked they only ever mention a difference in their culinary tastes.
This simple townhome maximizes space by building up. There is now plenty of room for a garden. Minor repairs needed.
This Victorian is in the gothic revival style. Its previous tenants went a bit overboard with the garlic decoration for unknown reasons.
A perfect plot to call your final resting place. Don't build here if bats give you the creeps. Many make their home in a nearby cave.
Vampires won't awaken from Hibernate unless they must.
Only a vampire wants to start messing around in a coffin.
Only vampires can initiate coffin woohoo
